# Tools

> Standard library basic mathematical tools.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var tools = require( '@stdlib/math/base/tools' );
```

#### tools

Standard library basic mathematical tools.

```javascript
var o = tools;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var tools = require( '@stdlib/math/base/tools' );

console.log( getKeys( tools ) );
```
